collectionId.description: The UUID of the collection associated with the document operation.

documentId.description: The UUID of the document to update.

name.description: The updated name of the document. If provided, must not be empty.

instructions.description: Updated instructions related to the document. If provided, must not be empty.

job.description: Whether to dispatch a reprocessing job. Defaults to false. Set to true to dispatch.

tables.description: Flag to perform additional table processing and analysis on the document.
